intro.description: My passion is in delievering scalable, efficient and beautiful products.

about.introduction: based out of Honolulu, Hawai'i. My passion is in building extraordinary digital expierences, and bridging the gap between engineering and design to deliever scalable, efficient and beautiful products.
about.extra: When I'm not coding, I'm probably making beats, playing the guitar or spending time at the beach.
about.intro: I am a design-minded front-end developer focused on building exceptional digital experiences. I am highly adaptable and driven by learning. If there is a problem, I seek ways to fix it. Whether it takes reading a book or picking up a lesson in a new framework, I’ve always been eager to solve the challenges that development can bring.
about.experience: I’ve worked at awesome places like ;Speridian Technologies;https://www.speridian.com/; and ;Ktuh FM Honolulu;https://ktuh.org/;, and built many cool things along the way. A recent Computer Science graduate from the ;University of Hawaii at Mānoa;https://manoa.hawaii.edu/;, I've had the opportunity to complete a three-month co-op at ;NSIN;https://www.nsin.mil/; and a two year engineering internship at ;Ameresco;https://www.ameresco.com/; – and get involved in the design, planning and execution of the 2022 Hawaiians in Tech Hackathon.
about.skills: My passion is in bridging the gap between engineering, design, and user experience. This shines in my front-end work – whether it’s upbuilding scalable resources, structuring my user-interfacing architecture with accessibility at the forefront, or writing code with future maintainers in mind.
about.interests: My interests include all things audio and music production - including sound design, composition, mixing and mastering. When not coding I’m either playing my guitars, sampling vinyl or spending time outside with my dog.
